title: Speakerphone microphone not working on pixel 4a
content:
When on a call the microphone works fine. But as soon as you switch to speakerphone the other person can't hear anything.

As far as I could gather the phone switches to the top microphone when speakerphone is activated. Seems that it's not working. 

Tried a few other apps as well. Whatsapp, Google meet, native phone app. All have the same issue.
